channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Control Center
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Control Center

item.title: CVE-2017-1758|2024-08-05T13:39:32.241Z -- ibm -- control%20center
item.description: IBM Financial Transaction Manager for ACH Services for Multi-Platform (IBM Control Center 6.0 and 6.1, IBM Financial Transaction Manager 3.0.2, 3.0.3, 3.0.4, and 3.1.0, IBM Transformation Extender Advanced 9.0) is vulnerable to a XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 135859.
